channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Monarch Tractor sued over tractors that were ‘unable to operate autonomously’
item.description: Burks Tractor, a dealership located in Idaho, has sued Monarch for breach of contract and allegedly violating its warranty because the California-base...

item.title: Toyota keeps betting on hybrid vehicles in the US
item.description: The investment follows an announcement last week that Toyota will spend up to $10 billion over the next five years in the United States.

item.title: Hugging Face CEO says we’re in an ‘LLM bubble,’ not an AI bubble
item.description: Hugging Face co-founder and CEO Clem Delangue says all the attention is on LLMs, but smaller, specialized models will make sense in many use cases goi...

item.title: Gemini 3 Is Here—and Google Says It Will Make Search Smarter
item.description: Gemini 3 is skilled at reasoning, generating video, and writing code. Amid talk of an AI bubble, Google notes the new model could help increase search...

item.title: The Best WIRED-Tested Extreme Alarm Clock of 2025: Not for the Faint of Heart
item.description: From runaway robots to “sonic bombs,” we reviewed offbeat alarm clocks designed to awaken even the heaviest sleepers.

item.title: Microsoft’s Agent 365 Tries to Be the AI Bot Boss
item.description: Microsoft still sees AI agents as the future of work, and the enterprise software giant wants companies to be able to manage those agents just like hu...

item.title: This Quest 3S Bundle Is $50 Off and Includes a Game and Gift Card
item.description: Pick up a new Meta headset, Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners, and pocket a $50 gift card in the process.

item.title: The Best Delivery Thanksgiving Meal Kits (2025)
item.description: Thanksgiving can be daunting. Meal kit boxes from Sunbasket and Blue Apron offer the satisfaction of making a home-cooked feast with a lot less stress...

item.title: AI data center provider Lambda raises whopping $1.5B after multibillion-dollar Microsoft deal
item.description: Lambda's new raise was a solid beat over the amount that deal-watchers say it was hoping to hit.

item.title: Meta wins antitrust trial as judge denies that it’s a monopoly
item.description: A federal judge ruled that Meta is not a monopoly in a lawsuit with the FTC.
